name: drupelet
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
any of the small individual parts containing a single seed that together form a fruit such as a blackberry (= a small dark purple fruit) or raspberry (= a small soft red fruit): This widely available "premium" raspberry has sweeter, more perfumed drupelets than most others. The dewberry is composed of fewer drupelets than the blackberry. Related words
drupe
blackberry
More examplesFewer examplesA raspberry is a small berry composed of many connecting drupelets.Fruit firmness in blackberries is primarily related to skin toughness and drupelet size.In extreme conditions, UV light associated with high temperatures can cause the drupelet to lose water content and colour.
